fields.name: biocondition_id
fields.label: BioCondition ID
fields.help: Identify uniquely the Biological Condition [Autogenerated].

fields.name: name
fields.label: Name
fields.help:
[required] An human readable short name for the Biological Condition.
E.g. MyExperiment_2h_condition1

fields.name: title
fields.label: Title
fields.help:
[required] An human readable title for the Biological Condition.
E.g. First set of samples for my Experiment, time 12h

fields.name: organism
fields.label: Organism
fields.help: Identify the organism(s) from which the biological material was derived.

fields.name: tissue_type
fields.label: Material type
fields.help: Identify bodily fluids or tissue (e.g. bone, muscle, etc.) from which the biological material was derived.

fields.name: cell_type
fields.label: Cell type
fields.help: Identify the cell type(s) from which the biological material was derived.

fields.name: cell_line
fields.label: Cell line
fields.help: Identify the cell line(s) from which the biological material was derived.

fields.name: gender
fields.label: Gender
fields.help: Classify the gender of studied organism from which the biological material was obtained (eg. Male or Female).

fields.name: genotype
fields.label: Genotype/Variation
fields.help: Specify if the biological material has a relevant Variation or Genotype (eg. Carrier of MLH1 variants).

fields.name: other_biomaterial
fields.label: Other details
fields.help: Other relevant information about the studied biological material.

fields.name: treatment
fields.label: Treatment
fields.help: Describe the applied Treatment during biological material grown or extraction.

fields.name: dose
fields.label: Dose
fields.help: Specify the dose of Treatment applied during biological material grown or extraction.

fields.name: time
fields.label: Time
fields.help: Identify the time-point in which the biological material was isolated (for time-series). Eg. 2h, 8h, 12h,...

fields.name: other_exp_cond
fields.label: Other details
fields.help: Other relevant information about experimental conditions.

fields.name: protocol_description
fields.label: Protocol Description
fields.help: Free text describing the used treatment for grow or maintain organisms or cells.

fields.name: treatment_document
fields.label: Treatment Document
fields.help: A complete description of the followed protocol or treatment. Only PDF files are supported. Max size 20Mb..

fields.name: owners
fields.label: Owners
fields.help: [required] Only owners can edit the information of the Biological Condition.

fields.name: submission_date
fields.label: Submission date
fields.help: [required] Date when this information was added.

fields.name: last_edition_date
fields.label: Last edition
fields.help: [required] Date when this information was last edited.

fields.name: external_links
fields.label: External links
fields.help: A list of related or useful links.
